sections.title: Gift Collection
sections.content: Our standard gift collections include a wide range of both physical gifts (i.e. a blanket or brownies) and charity impact options (i.e. plant 200 trees or give 50 meals to a child in need). Your recipients will have the option to redeem a physical gift or to give to a charitable cause that resonates with them. Prices are inclusive of shipping and taxes. Available only to recipients in the United States.

sections.title: Charity Giving Collection
sections.content: Our charity giving program is designed for those who would prefer to make a charity impact in honor of their gift recipients; and is available to send to gift recipients anywhere in the world. Gifts for Good regularly reviews its portfolio of nonprofit partners to ensure that a variety of social impact outcomes can be supported through the charity giving collection.

The list of nonprofit partners may change; some of our current charity partners include: American Cancer Society, Best Friends Animal Society, Eden Reforestation Projects, Giving Children Hope, Kids In Need Foundation, Project HOPE, Vitamin Angels, and Water for Good.

sections.title: International Collection (outside the U.S.)
sections.content: Our international collection is only available to gift recipients who live outside the United States. Physical gifts can only be shipped to eligible countries. Upon receiving their gift link, recipients will be prompted to enter their desired country to ship to and available gifts that can ship to that country will appear. If your recipient lives in a country where Gifts for Good cannot ship physical products, they will be presented with our charity giving collection. Prices are inclusive of taxes and shipping.

sections.title: Bulk Upload
sections.content: Note: If you are looking to do a bulk upload of your gift recipients, please login to GIFTforward on your desktop. Bulk upload via Excel/CSV file is not available on mobile.
Here is where you will be able to customize both the email to your recipients and the landing page for the selected gift collection.

This will be the email that arrives in your recipient's inbox with the unique link that leads to their curated gift collection landing page. You will be able to preview your email and landing page and can make adjustments before you send.

messages.designDescription: Design a customizable email for your recipients and the gift collection landing page.

sections.content: All purchases on GIFTforward are the purchase of Credits. Credits are gifting currency; 1 Credit = $1 USD (US Dollar). For example, if you have 100 credits in your account you can send one gift from the $100 collection. If your credit balance is lower than your cost at checkout you will be able to apply your credits first, and pay the remaining balance with a credit card.

If the gifts you send aren't redeemed by the recipient— either because their gift link expired or an email address bounced— the gift value automatically gets returned to your account in the form of credits. You can use those credits to do more good in the world—either by sending more gifts, or donating any remaining credits to charity.
Once your payment is completed, you will receive a receipt via email. Note: if you would prefer to pay via ACH, check, or wire transfer, please call (877) 554-1550 or email support@giftsforgood.com.
